title: Elegant Kundan and Kempu Stone Addigai Necklace
materials: Base metal alloy with 22K Gold Plating
features: Features traditional Addigai design with closely set Kundan stones. The pendant is an elaborate floral motif encrusted with Kundan, Kempu, and Emerald stones. The floral motifs are further enhanced by small pearls. Hyderabadi polish is applied to give a lustrous finish and antique appearance. This design embodies a rich cultural heritage.
occasions: festivals like Diwali and Sankranthi/ సంక్రాంతి
or traditional dance performances. Also suitable for special occasions where a touch of cultural elegance is desired.
description: A timeless and classic design rooted in South Indian heritage. Meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans, this necklace showcases the richness of Kundan and Kempu stones. Its adjustable length makes it versatile for various necklines, and the high-quality materials ensure durability and lasting beauty. A symbol of tradition and luxury, this Addigai necklace is sure to become a treasured heirloom.
